casebody.data:
[Hillsborough,

December, 1889.] Sargent Invalid Furniture Co. v. Sargent. E. E. Parker, W. L. Poster, and Gf. B. French, for the plaintiffs. J. W. Fellows and J. P. Bartlett, for the defendant. Bingham, J.

The agreed case is insufficient. All the material facts necessary for the determination of the questions of law, or .the decision of the cause, should appear.

Case discharged.

Smith, J., did not sit: the others concurred.
